name: Skyfighter Arcade
description:
Skyfighter Arcade


SkyFighter Arcade harkens back to the classic top-down shoot-em-up vertical scrollers, with modern day rogue-like twists. Test your reaction and maneuvering skills by blasting enemies out of the sky. Upgrade your Skyfighter and customize your loadout with upgradeable weapons and combo attacks.

Exciting Features Include

  • Customizable Loadouts - Use the right tool for the job! Choose between a wide selection of weapons and equipment, and choose how you want to slot your weapons!
  • Exciting Weapons - Each weapon carries with it its own unique characteristics and abilities! Choose from a rapid fire laser that can reflect enemy attacks, to homing missiles that cause splash damage
  • Devastating Special Attacks - Get rewarded for excellent maneuvering skills with energy for your special attacks! Perfectly dodge enemy attacks to fill up your special meter and execute a devastating attack!
